title: Razer Blade Stealth 13 Mercury White Review - The Best Ultrabook Right Now?
description: The Razer Blade Stealth 13 lineup can be confusing but the Mercury White edition is unique since it uses a 25W Intel Ice Lake processor and Iris Plus graphics instead of a GTX 1650.
